"items_game"
{
	"items"
	{
		"item_id"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"number" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" "\d+"
			"static_attributes"
			{
				"attribute_name"
				{
					"___$$$types"
					{
						"string" "1"
					}
					"___$$$regex" ".+"
				}
			}
			"used_by_heroes"

				"hero_name"
				{
					"___$$$types"

						"string" "1"

					}
					"___$$$regex" ".+"
				}
			}
